hostname.description: The Terraform Enterprise hostname to connect to. Defaults to app.terraform.io.

private_key_content.description: Content of private key used to decrypt `vaulted-tfe_variable` resources. This setting has higher priority than `private_key_path`.

private_key_path.description: Path to private key used to decrypt `vaulted-tfe_variable` resources. This setting has lower priority than `private_key_content`.

protocol.description: Protocol to use when connecting to specified `hostname` Terraform Enterprise. Defaults to https

ssl_skip_verify.description: Whether or not to skip certificate verifications.

token.description: The token used to authenticate with Terraform Cloud/Enterprise.

category.description: Terraform environment variable or environment variable to be provisioned in TFE. Valid values are either `terraform` or `env`.

description.description: Description of the variable that'll be provisioned in TFE

hcl.description: Whether to evaluate the value of the variable as a string of HCL code. Has no effect for environment variables.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace that owns the variable.

block.description: Creates/updates/destroys TFE Cloud variables. To read variables or provision non-sensitive ones, use the official TFE provider https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/tfe/latest
